name: Asteroid Attack (hassan mtayrek)
description:
Asteroid Attack is a simple game that is build on saving the earth. A spaceship needs to destroy the space rocks before they reach the earth, otherwise you will loose.

The spaceship have three life, avoid colliding will the space rock. If the spaceship collide with space rocks you will loose one of the three life that are given to the spaceship.

Be careful and destroy the space rocks before they reaches the earth. Be a hero!!
